txt.en: 'Those Heirsworn have some nerve lingering in the city. The scholars who come to my establishment have suffered enough; they do not need more reasons to fear for their safety!\n\n'If you decide to teach those fools a lesson, well... I would be happy to pay you. It is hard to miss them -- they lurk around the wreckage of the old academy and scriptorium to the north-west.'
Defeat Heirsworn at Dâr Jeraf and Kamîr Kateb ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
The Heirsworn threaten the scholars who congregate at the Pot and Quill.
Trouble for the Pot and Quill
Talk to Shûba at the Pot and Quill
You have defeated a number of Heirsworn.\n\nYou should report back to Shûba at the Pot and Quill.
'I can only hope the Heirsworn will stop darkening my doorstep from now on. If they continue pushing their luck, they shall find themselves at the bottom of a watery grave.'
Shûba has asked you to defeat a number of Heirsworn.\n\nHeirsworn can be found in the ruined area of the Tor-gardens, to the north-west.
